gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਨਿਰਮਲ ਦਰਪਨ ਮੈ ਨ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਕਛੂ ਸਕਲ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਦੇਖਤ ਦਿਖਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Niramal Darapan Mai N Chitr Kachhoo , Sakal Charitr Chitr Daykhat Dikhaavaee ?
translation: Just as a clean mirror has no image in it, but when one looks in it, it shows all the details in their true colours,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਨਿਰਮਲ ਜਲ ਬਰਨ ਅਤੀਤ ਰੀਤ ਸਕਲ ਬਰਨ ਮਿਲਿ ਬਰਨ ਬਨਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Niramal Jal Baran Ateet Reeta , Sakal Baran Mili Baran Banaavaee ?
translation: Just as clean water is bereft of all shades of colours, but acquires the colour that it mixes with,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੳੁ ਬਸੁੰਧਰਾ ਸੁਅਾਦ ਬਾਸਨਾ ਰਹਿਤ ਅੳੁਖਧੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਰਸ ਗੰਧ ੳੁਪਜਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Basoundharaa Suaad Baasanaa Rahita , Aoukhadhee Anayk Ras Gandh Oupajaavaee ?
translation: Just as Earth is free of all tastes and desires but produces myriads of herbs of different effects, plants capable of giving many types of medicinal and aromatic extracts,

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰਦੇਵ ਸੇਵ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਵ ਗਤਿ ਜੈਸੇ ਜੈਸੋ ਭਾੳੁ ਤੈਸੀ ਕਾਮਨਾ ਪੁਜਾਵੲੀ ॥੩੩੦॥
transliteration: Taisay Gurdayv Sayv Alakh Abhayv Gati , Jaisay Jaiso Bhaau Taisee Kaamanaa Pujaavaee ?330?
translation: Similarly with whatever sentiment one performs service of indescribable and inaccessible Lord-like True Guru, one's desires are filled accordingly. (330)
